name: SpaceTeam Zed
description:
This is a game about a mission to a planet which has claimed many spaceships.

This game was made in roughly 32 hours for the GameJolt Indies VS Gamers gamejam.

ControlsButtonActionW/A/S/D or LeftStickMovement.Mouse or RightStickRotate Camera.Mouse1 or RightTriggerShoot.Mouse2 or LeftBumperAim.Spacebar or RightBumperJump.E/F or ( X )Use. (Only needed after mission complete)
